summary: A unit‑test suite that verifies the behavior of a command‑line debugger used with JAX code, checking its ability to handle breakpoints, backtraces, variable inspection, frame limits, global/local scope resolution, and execution under JIT, pmap, and vmap transformations.
business_intent: Provide confidence that the debugger works correctly for developers debugging JAX applications, reducing troubleshooting time and ensuring accurate introspection of complex, parallelized code.
